== _class_ !CssOtbsFormatter _extends_ [ApiFormatterACssFormatter aCssFormatter] ==
This Formatter return an array of [ApiTokensACssToken tokens] formatted in [http://goo.gl/j4XdU OTBS (The One True Brace Style) indent style].

Indent string.

=== Methods ===
==== `void` _public_ [ApiFormatterACssFormatter#Methods aCssFormatter::__construct](`array` $tokens, `string` $indent = null, `integer` $padding = null) ====
Constructor setting the [ApiTokensACssToken tokens] and the indent string and declaration value padding.
